content.new:
Open source projects commonly have a single repository that acts as a landing page with an informative README and all the rest for the project as a whole. We don't have one of these.

Make the installer repo take on this role, by renaming it to 'labscr

issue.title: Rename this repository to something like 'labscript_suite' and have it contain central docs etc
